channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Premiere Rush
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Premiere Rush

item.title: CVE-2022-23204|2024-08-03T03:36:20.082Z -- adobe -- premiere%20rush
item.description: Adobe Premiere Rush versions 2.0 and earlier are affected by an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that could lead to disclosure of sensitive memory. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to bypass mitigations such as ASLR. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
